metadata.title: CVE-2021-44591 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In libming 0.4.8, the parseSWF_DEFINELOSSLESS2 function in util/parser.clacks a boundary check that would lead to denial-of-service attacks via acrafted SWF file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
